ACT
127
Unknown heirs
If it is not known who the heirs are, the court shall, by means of an advertisement published in the "Narodne novine" and in another suitable way, invite the persons claiming the right to inherit to report to the court.
If no heir comes forward within six months of the publication of the advertisement in the "Narodne novine", it will be determined that the estate has passed into the ownership of the municipality, or city specified in this Act. In this way, the heir who would come forward later does not lose his right to inherit or the right to demand inheritance according to the rules from Article 138 of this Act.
